maths.title: Milestones of Exploration
maths.intro: Each round reveals a moment in history. Jot the year (1–4 digits), then add your five answers together.
maths.note: Years are AD only; closest total takes the round.

events.prompt: Signing of the Magna Carta at Runnymede.
The Wright brothers complete the first powered flight at Kitty Hawk.
Neil Armstrong walks on the Moon during Apollo 11.
NASA and ESA launch the James Webb Space Telescope.

maths.question: Enter the year you think this event happened (1–4 digits).
